question: You live in a room in college which you share with another student.However, there are many problems with this arrangement and you find itvery difficult to work.Write a letter to the accommodation officer at the college. In the letter,• describe the situation• explain your problems and why it is difficult to work• say what kind of accommodation you would prefer
text: I hope this letter finds you well.I am writing this letter to say I have been living in room ten in college with another student but recently I have had a few issues so I decided to write this letter to help me to solve my problem.

In fact, I should describe that I am living with two students they are very noisy and I cannot spend enough time studying or resting or even working and when I talk and request realise me who do not understand me.In addition,I am used to tiding every day our room for the sake of I believe this subject completely related to our health that they do not help me to do it so as you know, I have to work inside the room as well as outside and it is extremely hard to me.
In view of the fact, I want to propose if it is possible I go to the private place because that area is fully fab for me and I am completely relaxed there and I can make a plan for my life.
Thank you for everything and I hope support me.
